column2: "Hello! It's a new year, and we're planning a New Year's Festival to celebrate!"
"But with the atmosphere as grim as it is, I worry that people won't be able to relax and enjoy it."
"So please! Can you lend a hand and help everyone smile again?"
"Happy New Year! It's a whole new beginning, and to celebrate, we're planning a New Year's Festival!"
"Of course, we have to make this event a good one if we want everyone to enjoy it!"
"So please! Will you help me again?"
"What's the situation like? Not long now until the big day!"
"How are you feeling? Not long now until the big day!"
"I'm sure you're keeping busy, but make sure you don't overstrain yourself!"
"Everyone's always working really hard, so I want to use this event to give them a chance to relax."
"Preparing this event is going to take a while."
"There's so many things that could get in the way, and it's hard to come up with ideas..."
"But I can't wait to see the smiles on everyone's faces when it's finally finished!"
"Leave the event planning to me. I'll do my best to make sure everyone can enjoy the festival!"
"The mood around here is great, isn't it? Seeing all these people around in such beautiful outfits is really lifting my spirits."
"Heheh, I'm definitely in celebration mode now! I can't wait to share this event with all of you!"

"あとはみんなが喜んでくれるように
新年祭のイベント開催に向けて
突き進むだけだよー！"

"ここからの準備は、わたしにまかせて
貴方はゆっくり休んでね！"

"おつかれさまー！
貴方にたーくさん協力してもらって
なにもかも、うまく行ってるよ！"

"あれもこれも実現できて
もう言うことないよー。
本当に本当にありがとう！"

"あとはわたしに任せて！
最高に楽しいイベントが始まるまで
ゆっくり休んでね！"
